duties_responsibilities.duty: Install, configure, test, troubleshoot, and maintain hardware and server software
Configure networks, routers, hubs, bridges, switches, and networking protocols
Lead small project teams on larger installations and develop project contingency plans
Participate in the deployment, maintenance, and support of current and new data center infrastructure
Troubleshoot and resolve critical or escalated technical issues
Test and troubleshoot new server hardware components and designs
Deploy and maintain advanced Data Center Server and Network Infrastructure

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
